title: Aztec Ruins National Monument: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning            Planning        The park welcomes feedback from the public as part of our planning process. Online comments should be entered on the National Park Service Planning, Environment and Public Comment (PEPC) website located at http://parkplanning.nps.gov/azru. Written comments may also be mailed to the superintendent:  Superintendent Aztec Ruins National Monument 84 County Road 2900 Aztec, NM 87410-9715
